title: VIDEO: University of Missouri researchers join the fight against microplastics | News | komu.com
text: VIDEO: University of Missouri researchers join the fight against microplastics - Updated MU researchers have developed a liquid-based solution that eliminates more than 98% of microscopic plastic particles. Tags As featured on MU researchers have developed a liquid-based solution that eliminates more than 98% of microscopic plastic particles.
